title: Notifications
markAllReadSuccess: All notifications have been marked as read.
markReadError: Could not mark notification as read.
markAllReadError: Could not mark all notifications as read.
timeoutError: Server took too long to respond. Please try again shortly.
noNotificationsDesc: New notifications will appear here when you receive invitations, messages or alerts.
noNotificationsMobileDesc: New notifications will appear here when you receive invitations or alerts.

deleteDialog.title: Remove notification
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove this notification? This action cannot be undone.

websocket.commentRepliedDesc: Your comment was replied by the administrator
websocket.accountApprovedDesc: Your registration request has been approved. You can now log in.

websocket.consultantInvitationDescFallback: You received an invitation from a consultant

preferences.title: Notification Settings
preferences.subtitle: Configure which notifications you want to receive
preferences.cardDesc: Enable or disable the types of notifications you want to receive. You can control in-app and email notifications separately.
